summary: The diff implements a single-page DirectSell.AI marketing landing page composed of TopNav, Hero, How It Works (with steps + example prompts), Features, Use Cases, FAQ, and Footer, plus a warm (non-blue/purple) theme. However, there is no explicit evidence that the required generated image files were added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and the diff introduces backend/auth-related code that was out of scope and conflicts with the stated constraints/non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static brand visuals by placing them in frontend/public/assets/generated and using them in the hero and/or navigation (do not serve images from the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The landing page references the required image paths, but the diff summary does not show the image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (the only omitted added file is unspecified, so image presence cannot be confirmed from provided evidence).
evidence: File diff summary: "Omitted files due to limits: added=1"

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister code added even though the request is for a marketing landing page and explicitly requires no backend involvement for assets.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on a frontend single-page marketing landing experience and states assets must be served statically from the frontend; adding backend code is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity / authentication scaffolding present in the app composition (provider + hooks), despite 'no requirement for authentication' and explicit non-goals around Internet Identity flows, plus immutable-file constraints.
hallucinated_features.reason: The app wraps the UI in InternetIdentityProvider and includes hooks related to identity/actors, which is outside the requested landing-page-only scope and conflicts with the stated non-goals/constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking added in the footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: Footer requirements only mention basic placeholder links (Privacy/Terms) and a short tagline; third-party attribution/tracking was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query infrastructure and placeholder queries file added.
hallucinated_features.reason: No data fetching or backend integration was requested for a static marketing landing page.
